com.write.Quill.data

Class Book

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.write.Quill.data.Book

  • public class Book
extends java.lang.Object
    Data model for "Book"

    A book is a collection of Pages and the tag manager together with some metadata like its title. The data is stored in a particular directory BookDirectory

    Author:
    vbraun
